source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video is shot from a first-person perspective, presenting a wide shot of an indoor hallway that extends from the foreground into the background, occupying the majority of the frame. A paper cutout of a cartoon character on a stick remains consistently positioned in the bottom right foreground. Initially, the hallway stretches forward, with light pink walls on the left and right, cream wainscoting along their base, and a deep red carpet running down the center, all receding into the background. A wall-mounted lamp is visible in the top right foreground, with others appearing in the middle ground on both sides as the perspective moves forward. The camera advances down the hallway, causing elements like framed pictures and additional lamps, initially in the middle ground on the left and right walls, to shift towards the foreground and eventually move out of frame. A white arched wall niche, initially in the background center, becomes more prominent in the middle ground as the camera progresses, flanked by white door frames to its left and right, also moving from the background towards the middle ground.

In the lower right corner of the frame, there is a white paper cutout of a cartoon character, drawn with black lines and held on a wooden stick, as part of the scene.**
